body_html:
We are working on moving the tensorflow/compiler/xla/statusor.h header in core TF. This way, we won't have to include XLA headers in the whl and it should fix the build issue you are seeing.

This should make it into the 1.9 official release.
body_text:
We are working on moving the tensorflow/compiler/xla/statusor.h header in core TF. This way, we won't have to include XLA headers in the whl and it should fix the build issue you are seeing.
This should make it into the 1.9 official release.
body:
We are working on moving the tensorflow/compiler/xla/statusor.h header in core TF. This way, we won't have to include XLA headers in the whl and it should fix the build issue you are seeing.

This should make it into the 1.9 official release.
